io.spine.tools.gradle.project

Interface Dependant

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DependantProject

    public interface Dependant
    Manages the dependencies of a Gradle project.

    Typically, represented by a DependencyHandler of the project.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void compile(Artifact artifact)
      Adds a new dependency within the compile configuration.
      default void compile(java.lang.String notation)

    • Method Detail

      • depend

        void depend(ConfigurationName configurationName,
            java.lang.String notation)
        Adds a new dependency within a given configuration.
        Parameters:
        configurationName - the name of the Gradle configuration
        notation - the dependency string, e.g. "io.spine:spine-base:1.0.0"

      • exclude

        void exclude(Dependency dependency)
        Excludes the given dependency from the project.
        Parameters:
        dependency - the dependency to exclude, may refer to multiple artifacts with different versions, classifiers, etc.

      • force

        void force(Artifact artifact)
        Forces all project configurations to fetch the particular dependency version.
        Parameters:
        artifact - the artifact which represents a dependency resolved to the required version

      • force

        void force(java.lang.String notation)
        Forces all project configurations to fetch the particular dependency version.
        Parameters:
        notation - the dependency spec, e.g. com.google.protobuf:protoc:3.9.0

      • removeForcedDependency

        void removeForcedDependency(Dependency dependency)
        Removes a forced dependency from resolution strategies of all project configurations.
        Parameters:
        dependency - the dependency to remove from the list of forced dependencies

      • removeForcedDependency

        void removeForcedDependency(java.lang.String notation)
        Removes a forced dependency from resolution strategies of all project configurations.
        Parameters:
        notation - the dependency spec, e.g. com.google.protobuf:protoc:3.9.0

      • compile

        default void compile(Artifact artifact)
        Adds a new dependency within the compile configuration.
        See Also:
        compile(String)

      • compile

        default void compile(java.lang.String notation)
        Adds a new dependency within the compile configuration.

        Though compile configuration is deprecated in Gradle, it is still used in order to define Protobuf dependencies without re-generating the Java/JS sources from the upstream Protobuf definitions.

        See Also:
        depend(ConfigurationName, String)

      • implementation

        default void implementation(java.lang.String notation)
        Adds a new dependency within the implementation configuration.
        See Also:
        depend(ConfigurationName, String)
